com.podevs.android.poAndroid.pokeinfo

Class PokemonInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.podevs.android.poAndroid.pokeinfo.PokemonInfo

  • public class PokemonInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Static data used to store all information regarding pokemon at all times. Uses caching to reduce read from disk time.
